description:
Play safely: 30 days money back guarantee!

Certificates: Course completion Certificates!

Quiz: Quiz to refresh your knowledge!

-- Welcome to the course: --

This course will guide you and teach you about the true super power behind adobe illustrator. that is creating awesome shapes in it. this course will introduce you all the basic and advanced shape creation tool in depth. show you how and where you can use those shape creation tool effectively.

You will learn and practice with a whole lot of example and even we will work with projects too. so you will understand these awesome shape creation tool in depth and master shapes creation in illustrator.

After completing this course!

  • You will have understanding of the true power of illustrator
  • you will have understanding of all the basics and advance shape creation tool in depth.
  • you will be able to create any shapes in illustrator.
  • you will be able to work effectively in illustrator.
  • you will be able to create your own icon set.
  • you will be able to create posters of your business.
  • you will understand multiple different way and techniques to create shapes in illustrator

Materials Included:

  • AI files
  • JPG files
  • PDF files
  • ASE files
  • fonts

At the end of course you will face the course completion quiz, Remember that will be compulsory to test you knowledge you learned in this course and for get your certificate. i hope you will love this course.

So let's get started !
title: Business design - hardcore shapes Creation with Illustrator
